Главная особенность второго эпизода — открытые пространства в лесистой местости за пределами Сити 17, в отличие от городских пейзажей руин города в Episode One, где основное действие происходит в ограниченных пространствах.Второй эпизод такой же, как и вся остальная серия, здесь есть все, что нужно настоящему экшену. Радует и тот факт, что второй эпизод значительно длиннее своего предшественника: 6-7 часов игрового времени во втором дополнении, против 4 часов в эпизоде №1.

Better than episode one for its better level design, story, and enemy variety. It's a fair bit longer as well, whch is nice, as its consistently fun to play, and not as aggrivating as its predecessor. The annoying difficulty spikes from ep. 1 are toned down here, but the last mission felt like one of the most stressful things I've done in a game... and I was playing on easy. 
Also, the ending is great, but it only makes me want Half-Life 3 even more. I need it. Pls Valve. 

4/5

All I have to say is that this game started me into game modding along with HL2 of coarse. More content and better than many games of its time. I still go back today and play it.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to take a virtual hike on a game? Well, in Half-Life 2: Episode Two, now you can...Well, sort of. Being the best of the Half-Life 2 Trilogy (At least in my opinion), Half-Life 2: Episode Two offers the best scenery a game can offer. It is also just the right length, not to long or to short! And most of the achievements are fairly easy to get...Only a few of them are challenging enough to be...Well, challenging! Read on for the full details...


Gameplay-Fairly smooth and straightforward it is. Non-Linear it is not. However, you do have the ablilty to explore the wilderness areas you encounter. But be prepared for comments and complaints from your female companion...XD! On slower systems, there may be some troubling aspects of the game, so be careful. Gameplay Score-8 out of 10.

Items-The items found in the game are generally simple by nature. In fact, as is the case with all games in the Half-Life series, the variety of items is few and far between. All items are beneficial in some way or another, however, so don't be afraid to pick them up. Items Score-6 out of 10.

Weapons-Plenty of interesting weapons to pick-up here, but again, there isn't lots in the variety category. However, most weapons have a primary and secondary firing modes, and some of them have rather interesting effects when one or both of these modes are used. Weapons Score-7 out of 10.

Ammo-The overall quality of the ammo is very good. However, the quantity of ammo doesn't always guarantee victory or even survival. Use it sparingly. Ammo Score-6 out of 10.

Armor-Yes, you do have armor in the game, however, instead of more than one kind, you have the ability to 'power up' your armor using charging stations. However, these and batteries are somewhat uncommon, so try to avoid getting struck to many times. Armor Score-5 out of 10.

Plot-The overall quality and depth of the story behind the game here isn't bad, but it's not great either. It starts off pretty well, though. In fact, without spoiling to many details, it's been an ongoing cliffhanger for nearly 10 years running. This doesn't bode well for the future of the series...If it even has one. Plot Score-6 out of 10.

Characters-Most of the characters are likable and have good personalities, although some of them are just plain annoying or silly. This doesn't make them necessarily bad. It simply means they're not vital to the plot in any way, shape, or form. They're just 'simply out there'. Characters Score-7 out of 10.

Sound-The overall quality of the sound is most agreeable. However, please note any details on it can't be given here without a spoiler or two. Sound Score-7 out of 10.

Music-Unlike the sound, it's not always desirable to listen to the music in the background. It may prove more distracting than beneficial. Music Score-4 out of 10.

Graphics-The overall quality of the graphics are surprisingly nice, even on slower systems! However, don't count on seeing anything stellar, such as is the case with games which were introduced later or even by different companies around the same time. Still though, the trees are nice to gaze upon and screenshot. Graphics Score-9 out of 10.

Final Score-This is a surprisingly nice game to play, just based on the above aspects I listed above. And speaking of which, did I mention taking a hike on this game is pretty much possible? It's true! All you have to do is walk through the tunnel after getting the boring yellow car. From there, take a hike through the pristine Paiute Mountains Wilderness of Colorado until you're ambushed at a barn. From there, drive until you don't have to do so anymore. After this, you can pretty much hike your way to the end of the game. Now this is what I call hiking awesomeness!
Has got to be one of the most heartbreaking cliffhangers in video game history, with no continuation/conclusion to the story...

I love this game but I can't recommend anyone getting it. I can't tell you to buy and play the best game that is on steam. half life 2 or any of the episodes. You'll be sucked in to a good story and great game play aaaannnd then it just ends. It's like finding the girl or guy of your dreams (I don't judge) and everything is awesome and life has  never been better. then you come home one day to find out it's all over. he she ran off with all of your stuff and not so much as a note.  Yeah,  pretty hard,  I know.  This is how you'll feel after the end. valve hasn't given a new anything to this game in like 7 years. so get ready for the unresovled break up you'll never get over. Great game tho.

Gordon e Alyx sobrevivem ao acidente de trem ocorrido no final de Half Life 2 Episode One. A explosão do reator do portal Combine provocou tempestades de portais que estão destruindo o planeta. A City 17 está completamente destruída.
Gordon e Alyx começam uma jornada até White Forest, base da resistência humana. Desta base é disparado um míssel que contém a explosão do portal Combine e salva a Terra.
Ao final ocorre algo inesperado e nada agradável.
Os cenários do jogo são muito bonitos e mostram o potencial da engine Source. Aqui entra no enredo definitivamente a Aperture Science do jogo Portal.
Este episódio deixa muitas perguntas sem respostas, o que alimenta ainda mais a sede pelo próximo game.
Great game, highly recommended!

[i]Познакомился с серией Half-Life я очень давно, ещё со времен первой части. Через некоторое время добрался и до второй. Оба проекта мне понравились, но эпизоды я упорно не проходил. Не так давно друг всё же убедил меня взяться за них.[/i] 
    [i][b]БОГИ![/b][/i] Как я ошибался, откладывая эпизоды на дальнюю полку! Много экшена, интересное продолжение сюжетной линии и всё те же герои. 7 часов игры не забудутся никогда.
    На этот раз Гордону пришлось пройти через огонь, и воду, и медные трубы. Где мы только не были и с кем только не боролись. Меня Эпизод 2 действительно впечатлил, начиная вступлением и заканчивая развязкой (про чертовых Советников я совсем забыл (>_<)!) Лучшая часть серии, больше и добавить нечего. Обязательно купите весь пак Half-Life 2 и наслаждайтесь этим миром! 
[i]Пока можно убивать Г.О.-шников гранатами, hf не перестанет мне нравиться. "Ложись, ложись!" (с) imkvazit[/i]

This game continues right where Half-Life: Episode One ends. It's pretty much the same gameplay and scenario of the Half-Life saga. A bit longer than Half-Life: Episode One but not as long as Half-Life 2. It can take about 10 hours to finish the game and complete al achievements. If you like Half-Life, and you want to know what happened after Episode One, go for this one.

"DON'T LEAVE ME!!"

HL:Ep 2 is the continuing struggle for Gordan Freeman, and Alyx Vance, who have now escaped City 17. The combine is advancing on White Forrest, a former Missile silo located in the hills. But before you can make your way there, you quest takes a dark turn, when Alyx is struck down and close to death. Episode 2 puts more heart and sole into the characters, and White Forrest itself sets the stage for one of the greatest forrest battles in gaming history. The game ends however on a very sad note, when Advisors attack following the successful lauch of the rocket.

10/10

Half-Life 2 est pour moi l'incarnation de la perfection videoludique : Ultra immersif (Le moteur Source arrive encore à me bluffer aujourd'hui, et le level design est magnifique en plus d'être très varié), un scenario excellent, une durée de vie plus que correcte (Une vingtaine d'heures pour le joueur lambda en comptant les deux extensions), une jouabilité plus que jouissive... Bref, je vous remercie, développeurs de chez Valve, mais j'ai une question: QUAND ALLEZ VOUS NOUS SORTIR CE FOUTU HALF-LIFE 3 ?!

Finally finished my favorite Steam Game. I've been a fan of Half Life since the very first and still have my original CD case with the HL1 Media. Countless hours in front of the computer enjoying every thrilling moment of it. Episode 2 comes to a critial event in the storyline and I'm glad that Valve has been able to keep some consistency throughout the entire game from HL2 to Episodes 1 and 2. I'd expect an Episode 3 soon as the story goes on. High quality graphics and even more enhanced gameplay. Highly recommended and a must have.
